67477.「時の王者 <pc>さま。\n この光を ご覧ください。:
<pc>, the Time Sovereign.
Please gaze upon this light.

67478.「この光球こそが…… グレイナル叙事詩。:
This ball is light is...
...the Epic of Greygnarl.

67479.「叙事詩といっても じつは書ではなく \n かつての聖竜の 精神の残滓とでも呼ぶ:
This epic is no book...it is actually a glimmer of lightーa remnant of the sacred dragon's spirit. It can tell us what once
transpired.

67480.「それでは 叙事詩に問いかけてみましょう。 \n 我らの 歩むべき道を。:
I shall now ask the epic a question...
The path we must take.

67483.「これは……凍えきった光……。 \n 幾星霜の年月を経たことで\n 今は 眠りに:
This... This light has completely frozen...
It appears to be dormant now after many,
many years.

67484.「<pc>さま……。\n 我ら 世告げの姫に受け継がれてきた\n 伝承の中に こ:
<pc>... There is a tradition that's
been handed down to the Princesses of
Prophecy. It goes something like this...

67485.「グレイナル叙事詩を 眠りから覚ますのならば\n 竜の火酒を 求めよ……。\n:
If you would wake the Epic of Greygnarl from its slumber, seek the Dragon Sake... for the fire wine will be borne by the fire lizards
of the Flaming Mountain.

67486.「炎の山の火トカゲとは\n ドワチャッカ大陸の カルサドラ火山に生息する\n 赤:
The Fire Lizard of the Flaming Mountain is a
red monster <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> that inhabits
Calsadora Volcano in Dwachakka Continent.

67487.「どうか その魔物を倒し\n 竜の火酒を 手に入れてきてくださいまし。:
Please go defeat the monster and get the
Dragon Sake.

67488.「……さすがは <pc>さま。\n グレイナル叙事詩を 目覚めさせるための\n:
...as one would expect from <pc>. You
have received the Dragon Sake to awaken the
Epic of Greygnarl.

67489.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Rhodia the Dragon Sake?<yesno><close>

67490.「竜の火酒がなければ グレイナル叙事詩を\n 目覚めさせることはできません……。:
Without Dragon Sake we cannot awaken the Epic
of Glenal... <pc> please.

67491.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Rhodia the Dragon Sake?<yesno><close>

67493.「これが竜の火酒……\n 強い魔力を感じます。:
This is Dragon Sake...it has a strong magic
power.

67494.「聖竜よ。竜の火酒を 捧げます。\n どうか 目をお覚ましください……。:
O holy dragon. I offer you this Dragon Sake.
Please, wake up...

67495.ロディアは 竜の火酒を泉に注いだ。: Rhodia poured Dragon Sake into the fountain.

67496.<center>……長い…あまりにも長い眠りじゃった。: It was a long...too long sleep.

67497.「……聖竜グレイナルよ。 \n お目覚めを 待ち望んでおりました。:
Grainaru, the holy dragon. We have long
awaited your awakening.

67498.<center>ふう…………。\nふたたび 災厄の時が訪れたか。:
Well... once again, the time for disaster has
come.

67499.<center>そして そこの者よ。\n貴様が 時の王者……であるか？: And you, there. Are you the King of Time?

67500.<center>貴様が 災厄の王への道を開くために\nわしを訪ねてきたこと\nこ:
I know that you have come to me to pave the
way to the King of Calamity.

67501.<center>……思いだすのう。\n初代王者と翔けた あの空を。:
I remember. That sky where I flew with the
first champion.

67502.<center>できることなら わしの翼で 貴様を\n災厄の王が眠る地まで 導い:
If I could, I would use my wings to guide you to the land where the King of Calamity lies, but I can no longer fly with my body like
this.

67503.<center>災厄は 長き眠りの時代を経て\n想像を絶するほどに\n強大な存在:
The plague has gone through a long period of
slumber, transforming itself into an
unimaginably powerful entity.

67504.<center>ふたりめの王者の言うとおり\nもはや 王者ただひとりのチカラで\:
As the second champion said, it is no longer
possible for a single champion to destroy it
by his own strength.

67505.<center>ゆえに わしが\n貴様に 新たなチカラを授けてやろう。: Therefore, I will give you new power.

67507.<center>そのカギは 王者の資格を持つ者同士を\n巡り合わせるためのもの。:
The Champion's Key is meant to bring those who
qualify for the Champion's Key to each other.

67508.<center>名などない物だが……そうじゃな。\n王者のカギとでも 名付けると:
It has no name, but...well...
Let us call it the Sovereign's Key.

67509.<center>そのカギに導かれ 集まった者同士が\n同盟を組んだならば ８人の:
If those who are guided by that key and gather together form an alliance, they will be able to unite the power of eight persons to
challenge the King of Calamity.

67510.<center>たとえ ひとりでは敵わぬとも\n８人の王者のチカラが集えば\nか:
Even though one person may not be able to
defeat a disaster, the power of eight
champions may come together to defeat it.

67511.<center>さあ 行け 時の王者よ。\n貴様自身の手で 地獄の門を開き\n地:
Go now, champion of time. With your own hands,
open the gates of hell and soar through it!

67512.<center>わしは 今一度 長き…長き眠りにつき\n次代…の 到来…を待と…:
I shall once again sleep the long sleep and
wait for the coming of the next generation.

67513.「時の王者 <pc>さま……。\n 私は このカギを手に 落陽の草原へ戻り\n:
Champion's Key and I will return to Sunset
Meadow to await <pc>.

67514.「ついに 災厄の王との決戦となります。 \n 充分に備えて いらしてください。\:
At last, the battle against the King of Calamity is about to begin. Please be well prepared. Please make use of this for the
battle.

67515.「落陽の草原の 光の河……。\n そこより 地獄の門を開きましょう。:
Rivers of light in the Sunset Meadow... from
there, let us open the gates of hell.
